CBOX_QUIT_QUESTION: DO YOU REALLY WANT TO QUIT?
TUTORIAL_1_MSG_0: Welcome to the tutorial! Use <color=$COLOR_INPUT>$INPUT_DIRECTIONAL</color> to move <color=$COLOR_P1>Sonic</color> and <color=$COLOR_INPUT>$INPUT_FIRE1</color> to jump.
TUTORIAL_1_MSG_1: A <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>PARTNER</color> can open that door for you. Press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>$INPUT_FIRE2</color> to switch the current player.
TUTORIAL_1_MSG_2: <color=$COLOR_P3>Knuckles</color> can climb walls! Using <color=$COLOR_P3>Knuckles</color>, press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> twice (slowly) and hit a wall.
TUTORIAL_1_MSG_3: This is a <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>teleporter</color>. Press the switch to bring the entire team to this place. It works only once.
TUTORIAL_1_MSG_4: <color=$COLOR_P2>Tails</color> can fly! Using <color=$COLOR_P2>Tails</color>, keep pressing the <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> button (but do not hold it).
TUTORIAL_2_MSG_0: Now you can try by yourself. There are some enemies this time, though.
TUTORIAL_2_MSG_1: Please note that you can only switch the current player if you're standing on the ground!
TUTORIAL_2_MSG_2: Do you know the <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>spindash</color> move? Hold <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color>, press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> and then release the <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color> button.
TUTORIAL_2_MSG_3: Congratulations! Now you know how to play Open Sonic!
BOZ_1_MSG_0: Welcome! If this is the first time you play, you should see the <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>tutorial</color> before (at the main menu)
BOZ_1_MSG_1: While you're standing on the ground, press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>LEFT CONTROL</color> to switch the current player
BOZ_1_MSG_2: Smash that box to get the <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>Magic Glasses</color>! Those glasses have special powers.
BOZ_1_MSG_3: Both <color=$COLOR_P2>Tails</color> and <color=$COLOR_P3>Knuckles</color> can fly. Try pressing the <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> button a few times.
BOZ_1_MSG_4: You're doing well! A <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>PARTNER</color> can help you to open this door.
BOZ_1_MSG_5: Do you know the <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>spindash</color> move? Hold <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color>, press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> and then release the <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color> button.
BOZ_3_MSG_0: Please choose a character now. You won't be able to switch the active member during the boss fight.
EP_1_MSG_0: Do you know the <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>spindash</color> move? Hold <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color>, press <color=$COLOR_INPUT>JUMP</color> and then release the <color=$COLOR_INPUT>DOWN</color> button.
EP_2_MSG_0: This is a <color=$COLOR_SPECIAL>DNA DOOR</color>. Only <color=$COLOR_P1>Sonic</color> can pass doors like this one.
PROTOTYPE_1_MSG_0: This was used early on the project. As you can see, it's a very beautiful level. Enjoy! ;)
TESTZONE_1_MSG_0: This is the test zone. It was used to test some stuff related to the game engine. Enjoy! ;)
DESERT1_MSG_0: This mini level shows off Celdecea's first OpenSonic brickset!
DESERT1_MSG_1: What did you think? The goal is just ahead!
DESERT1_MSG_2: This is a place for those who can see...
DESERT1_MSG_3: A loop will go here some day.
